job_history.work_description: Relocated to corporate offices and continued to handle all financial aspects of Biologics Development Services, along with 7 additional entities that were start up companies.

Responsible for the site management of the BDS facility (laboratory, storage, archive, server room, office areas etc.), equipment, utilities, supplies, security, general maintenance, and human resources.

Responsible for all financial aspects, which includes reporting directly to the CEO. Assisting in the implementation of entire office: including working with general contractors on modifications/completion of build-out, purchasing/installation of equipment for lab and office furniture.
Responsible for the oversight, management, security, availability and operations of the IT infrastructure, network applications and software systems at BDS.

Assistant Controller in completion & review of over 30 entities. Managed a staff of 9 accounting employees and over 200 offsite employees in HR, Payroll, Skyline system training, integrated a system wide remote banking process, set up procedures to minimize labor costs.

Assisted GM in monthly financial forecasts; annual budgeting; Integrated with tenants on billing issues, which included: reconciliations, collections of checks, deposits and making sure all tenants accounts were at zero by the end of the month.

Full Responsibility and managing all functions of 5 separate companies over my tenure. A/P, A/R, Collections, Time and Billing, Order entry, G/L, Financial Statements, Sales Commissions, Month end reports, closings of all modules.
Full Responsibility for A/P, A/R, Inventory, Cost Accounting, Purchasing, Assisted with all Sales Proposals, generating and reconciling all month end reports.

Full Responsibility for managing entire manufacturing/production control departments (totaling 31 employees). Duties included but were not limited to the following: scheduling production flow, shipments, employee work schedules, overtime, and vacations; managed purchasing; primary customers interface on product status; customers included: Raytheon, Honeywell; chaired daily production meetings.

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience handling financial aspects of multiple companies, including budgeting, forecasting, and financial reporting, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Has over 20 years of experience in accounting, including A/P, A/R, collections, time and billing, order entry, G/L, financial statements, and sales commissions, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has held multiple leadership roles, including VP of Finance/Operations, Controller/Office Manager, and Assistant Controller, managing staff and overseeing various departments, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has experience with implementing entire office setups, working with general contractors, and overseeing IT infrastructure, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: IT Management
skills.explanation: Has experience as an IT Administrator, overseeing IT infrastructure, network applications, and software systems, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Has experience with annual budgeting and financial forecasting, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Has experience with payroll management, but the extent of this experience is not explicitly stated, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Human Resources
skills.explanation: Has experience with HR-related tasks, including training and integrated remote banking processes, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Microsoft Office
skills.explanation: No explicit mention of Microsoft Office skills, but it is likely used in various roles, indicating no direct evidence of proficiency.
